entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -13.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Old Crow Airport 12:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -13.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -16.6°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:43 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:43 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
